item.description:
I will be serving as registrar and co-leader for this challenging AMC winter trip (Alex N is leader).  Full winter gear and winter hiking experience are essential.  Traction is a must. Please bring crampons and snowshoes - need for these will depend upon conditions.

The hike will cover 3 of New Hampshire's 4K peaks: Carter Dome, Wildcat and Wildcat D. Expected distance is about 11 miles, with roughly 5200 feet of elevation gain.  We will start at the Nineteen Mile Brook trail head. Time to be announced. A car spot will be necessary.

NEHM members interested in participating can register for and use the REGI system, or they can email me.  You can also RSVP here and I will be in touch. Further details TBA.  Contact info, including phone contact, is needed.

 https://www.hbbostonamc.org/registrationSystem/224
item.name: Late Notice Leap Year Hike - Carter Dome and the Wildcats
